title: Parisian police were going to close the bouquinistes (booksellers) along the Seine...
content:
Parisian police were going to close the bouquinistes (booksellers) along the Seine for the Olympics but Macron nixed that plan. In their defense, the booksellers quoted Camus: ‚ÄúEverything that degrades culture shortens the paths that lead to servitude.‚Äù

üí¨ Join the discussion on kottke.org ‚Üí
author: Jason Kottke
